Text: Uwe̩, O Jihofa, oñ nadʼonugo-mi dago ñw u.
O O̩jo̩-mi, uwe̩ omi te̩take̩do̩nʼo,
I-i, i nʼe̩ne̩ du ki anede we̩ kʼanyo̩ amʼu n;
Kʼo̩na o̩na-we̩ ña mi, O Jihofa;
Ne̩ mi le ef ochochi-we̩, kʼe̩ ko̩ mi o̩la,
O Jihofa, e̩ nalibekado ejumomi o̩gbaje̩je̩-we̩ kpai ufe̩de̩nyo̩-we̩,
E̩ ki rewa adure e-o̩jo̩kolo̩bia-mi n, kpai e̩re̩ ubi kʼu ro̩ ñw e̩ n;
Jihofa chenyo̩ kpai o̩kpakpa;
I aña ame̩ne̩chikimi o̩na alu kʼajo̩ O̩jo̩ ka,
Ikpa ikpa Jihofa du chʼufe̩de̩nyo̩ kpai ochochi,
O Jihofa, tod odu-we̩,
Ugbo e̩ne̩ ki arailo Jihofa de̩?
Onugo e̩ne̩ le̩ agugu to̩ko̩o̩,
Afili O̩jo̩ dʼugbo abo ku ma railo-wñ,
Eju-mi tʼo̩wo̩ ugbo ki Jihofa de̩ pioo,
Rida aba mi, kʼe̩ li mi ejumomi;
O̩pe̩cha ki dʼe̩do̩-mi anana nyo̩gba,
Gʼo̩bata-mi kpʼakanya-mi,
Gʼame̩nebi-mi, todu ma chewewe,
O fʼonugo-mi de, kʼe̩ gba mi;
Je̩ ñw e̩do̩ foo kpai e̩do̩ kpoko ki gba mi nyi,
O O̩jo̩ mʼIsrae̩l gba tane̩,
